posts.title: 터치디자이너 어쩌고 저쩌고
posts.content:
오늘 터디 작업물 예쁘게 나온거 있어서 인스타에 릴스로 올렸거든.

근데 이상하게 프레임이 떨어지더라.

처음 딱 올렸을 때는 괜찮은데, 나중에 다시 보면 프레임드랍이 생김.

웃긴건 인스타 스토리에서는 드랍 없이 잘 나오더라고ㅋㅋ

![](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/77856570-5fe0-814f-8736-0003b9bd3f32/cd99bbea-8145-44cf-8c74-5f517c986df4/1000003098.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB4662YPFW2DJ%2F20260105%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260105T180123Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEIL%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIEscDZxj6LK1E9KRWh3x%2FC5ylAk9E%2BnW7nmY5w0GxU9rAiEA8B59Rb%2FCqxmDI3Q2hOSOzvUIYllSbHTDvFArSvsvFX0q%2FwMISxAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDMmW0tIhWuH4B65PGyrcAzwtqQ%2BRzY3K4WYpG%2BVzBDLK2VH9RBUsWlgLIzfpF8tIR8mL09vdZbbodIR4hftVgiKuJVxgyA8VZHiWSA1c1pchlUUoxSzvXAYaf44kBCS09lXpx7k9QJpkMkbGmbIiszSjgcs3%2FxpY3rmuAhTjyYDb%2B6cv42IPVpR81t%2B8URdJXDOaJKdV8iXV%2F7vZpe42taDjsRev8Gv2qp6QUGS0s0PmI0q4hRdlVoFpQ3sNE2FDYPoO5F0gZnCLLMmJpJN%2BupzxhLASb671piccLFW6jthMoEvyNQCoNxHXLjskxvJlKTaTJoadpZOWkFHBCWonGFf5OGzzC5UbtMf%2FtxF8%2Bj3U4PS4dDngpA5kcohR31NVqGpyvum2Cd99pOzG2GSyP3i9opk0uwOf%2Fo%2BOLTpTDeFb%2FP7l2AwEyhPkzmb6UuimDelbi%2BRDUyQlcPHEJm9GMVTGdI%2FY6N3bO4GrYsri13PhRuGvLgd641OXaF8AF1fVJkBalRYwFxCrb7nEWoL7S3u1X5FEPZ0rM7v8W6cyaFYlN1Q2Oox4xPzEfkxGoVSVBboOcS5dXl2wS1NaOfsX14Hpe6CeCS88LIbjilfxzvlxFaKdyzCzp3Ce4Enz8PDb%2BieUG%2FbqCdRVkBAJMMvz78oGOqUBSPFAfzZloAvwHv6gKZOZC5uxQn1zYuZvH2PhyNOQD2u5B7KOfqnDwiUz%2FKt%2FQgj68LfFO2E8GDZA4Lay4GFohKYbTU1Kdx2VSB%2FEcDEuoftG6IDguvoeIxepcSVMxMP7wZhLWSe%2BvI7QI%2FJ%2FWqkbanQe9uJ6Yzkwo00bI1m4ygW%2BOJFBrmVnU3EbDdixcopz8P7jzZVgOUOtuDWnk%2FZBvH1AZHsb&X-Amz-Signature=06792cd3e2646992c163c5ded9f2fa73518de781a3b6fdca8847d04437252b89&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-amz-checksum-mode=ENABLED&x-id=GetObject)
심증과 물증이 있어도 우리는 그들을 건들 수 없다. 순종하거나 죽임을 당하거나 선택지는 둘 중 하나. 세상에 진실을 알리고 잘못된 것들을 바로잡고 싶다면 결국 내가 그들을 집어삼킬 수 있을 만큼 거대해지는 수밖에 없다.
